com.pureperfect.ferret
Interface Prefilter

public interface Prefilter

A pre-filter determines whether or not a given resource should be allowed to be added to the scan path. See Scanner.setPrefilter(Prefilter).

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
J. Chris Folsom
See Also:
Scanner

          Determine whether or not the given file should be allowed.

          Determine whether or not the given url should be allowed.
